name: Don't stand in the rain
description:
"Don't stand in the Rain" is a puzzle game, where you are controlling a lone robot in some weird facility. Each level contains more or less rain. As a machine, that is highly dangerous to touch so you must take extra care to circumvent it.

I mean, its really simple, its in the title.

Just don't touch the rain.

The first bigger project I tried my hands on. It started as a rain mechanic that looked kinda cool, but took a lot, and I mean a ton of ressources.

I even made a discord for it, found a couple pixel artist, but for technical reasons, the whole thing never really went off. The main mechanic always felt kind of lackluster and weird to play with. I tried to implement it in a couple of ways, but it never clicked.

So I moved on after 6 Prototypes.

I am a single developer and all my games will be free to play over at itchio/steam/etc... I am currently making games as a hobby. This won't change in the near future, but with enough support via Patreon I can outsource some parts of game-making like art, sound and music. This will not only vastly improve the games, but will make development much faster https://www.patreon.com/korbohned Your support is very appreciated! KorbohneD
